FuncDef: This command specifies the scheduling rate applied to the HS WRR group in Kb/s. Alternatively, the keywordmaxcan be specified, which removes the bandwidth limitation on the HS WRR group. Therateandpercent-ratecommands are mutually exclusive.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the scheduling rates of the HS WRR group in Kb/s. Values-1 to 2000000000, max.
